00055 //=============================================================================
00056 //Static member definitions
00057 //=============================================================================
00058 const unsigned int TeleopSourceKeyboard::STEPS_DEFAULT = 3;
00059 const unsigned int TeleopSourceKeyboard::STEPS_MIN     = 1;
00060 const unsigned int TeleopSourceKeyboard::STEPS_MAX     = 5;
00061 
00062 const unsigned int TeleopSourceKeyboard::KEYCODE_SPACE = 0x20;
00063 const unsigned int TeleopSourceKeyboard::KEYCODE_UP    = 0x41;
00064 const unsigned int TeleopSourceKeyboard::KEYCODE_DOWN  = 0x42;
00065 const unsigned int TeleopSourceKeyboard::KEYCODE_RIGHT = 0x43;
00066 const unsigned int TeleopSourceKeyboard::KEYCODE_LEFT  = 0x44;
00067

00071 //=============================================================================
00072 //Method definitions
00073 //=============================================================================
00074 TeleopSourceKeyboard::TeleopSourceKeyboard() :
00075   mIsInitialised(false) {
00076   //Set step size using setter in order to update both steps and step size
00077   setSteps(STEPS_DEFAULT);
00078 }
00079 //=============================================================================
00080 TeleopSourceKeyboard::~TeleopSourceKeyboard() {
00081   //Shutdown (should always succeed)
00082   if (!shutdown()) {
00083     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceKeyboard::~TeleopSourceKeyboard: warning: ignoring error in shutdown\n");
00084   }
00085 }
00086 //=============================================================================
00087 bool TeleopSourceKeyboard::setSteps(unsigned int steps) {
00088   //Sanity check
00089   if (STEPS_MIN > steps || STEPS_MAX < steps) {
00090     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceKeyboard::setSteps: error: invalid steps (%u)\n", steps);
00091     return false;
00092   }
00093 
00094   //Lock access to members
00095   boost::lock_guard<boost::recursive_mutex> memberLock(mMemberMutex);
00096 
00097   //Set steps and step size
00098   mSteps = steps;
00099   mStepSize = (TeleopAxisValue)(TELEOP_AXIS_MAX - TELEOP_AXIS_MIN)/(2*mSteps);
00100 
00101   //Return result
00102   return true;
00103 }
00104 //=============================================================================
00105 unsigned int TeleopSourceKeyboard::getSteps() {
00106   //Lock access to members
00107   boost::lock_guard<boost::recursive_mutex> memberLock(mMemberMutex);
00108 
00109   //Return steps
00110   return mSteps;
00111 }
00112 //=============================================================================
00113 bool TeleopSourceKeyboard::init() {
00114   //Lock access to members
00115   boost::lock_guard<boost::recursive_mutex> memberLock(mMemberMutex);
00116 
00117   //If already initialised shutdown first (shutdown should always succeed)
00118   if (mIsInitialised && !shutdown()) {
00119     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceKeyboard::init: warning: ignoring error in shutdown\n");
00120   }
00121 
00122   //Raw termios settings
00123   struct termios rawTermios;
00124 
00125   //Remember old termios settings for stdin
00126   tcgetattr(STDIN_FILENO, &mOldTermios);
00127   memcpy(&rawTermios, &mOldTermios, sizeof(struct termios));
00128 
00129   //Update stdin to use raw mode
00130   rawTermios.c_lflag &= ~(ICANON | ECHO);
00131   tcsetattr(STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &rawTermios);
00132 
00133   //Print welcome message
00134   fprintf(stdout, "\n\nUse arrow keys to move and space to stop.  Press CTRL-C to quit.\n");
00135 
00136   //Note that we're prepared
00137   mIsInitialised = true;
00138 
00139   //Return result
00140   return true;
00141 }
00142 //=============================================================================
00143 bool TeleopSourceKeyboard::listen(unsigned int listenTimeout, TeleopState* const teleopState, bool* updated) {
00144   //Set default value
00145   *updated = false;
00146 
00147   //Sanity check
00148   if (NULL == teleopState) {
00149     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceKeyboard::listen: error: NULL teleop state\n");
00150     return false;
00151   }
00152 
00153   //Lock access to members
00154   boost::lock_guard<boost::recursive_mutex> memberLock(mMemberMutex);
00155 
00156   //Ensure we're initialised
00157   if (!mIsInitialised) {
00158     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceKeyboard::listen: error: not initialised\n");
00159     return false;
00160   }
00161 
00162   //Ensure state has correct number and types of axes and buttons
00163   if (2 != teleopState->axes.size()) {
00164     teleopState->axes.resize(2);
00165     teleopState->axes[0].type  = TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_LIN_X;
00166     teleopState->axes[0].value = 0.0;
00167     teleopState->axes[1].type  = TELEOP_AXIS_TYPE_LIN_Y;
00168     teleopState->axes[1].value = 0.0;
00169   }
00170   if (0 != teleopState->buttons.size()) {
00171     teleopState->buttons.clear();
00172   }
00173 
00174   //Initialise a file descriptor set for select
00175   fd_set fileDescriptorSet;
00176   FD_ZERO (&fileDescriptorSet);
00177   FD_SET (STDIN_FILENO, &fileDescriptorSet);
00178 
00179   //Initialise timeout value for select
00180   struct timeval timeout;
00181   timeout.tv_sec = listenTimeout / 1000;
00182   timeout.tv_usec = (listenTimeout % 1000) * 1000;
00183 
00184   //Use select to see if anything shows up before timeout
00185   int result = select(FD_SETSIZE, &fileDescriptorSet, NULL, NULL, &timeout);
00186   if (0 == result) {
00187     //Timeout
00188     return true;
00189   } else if (-1 == result) {
00190     //Error
00191     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceKeyboard::listen: error: select() failed (%d)\n", errno);
00192     return false;
00193   }
00194 
00195   //Data available, read one event
00196   char c;
00197   if(0 >= read(STDIN_FILENO, &c, 1)) {
00198     fprintf(stderr, "TeleopSourceKeyboard::listen: error: read() failed\n");
00199     return false;
00200   }
00201 
00202   //Process event and return result
00203   return handleEvent(c, teleopState, updated);
00204 }
00205 //=============================================================================
00206 bool TeleopSourceKeyboard::shutdown() {
00207   //Lock access to members
00208   boost::lock_guard<boost::recursive_mutex> memberLock(mMemberMutex);
00209 
00210   //If we're not prepared we're done.  This means this method can be called
00211   //multiple times without problems.
00212   if (!mIsInitialised) {
00213     return true;
00214   }
00215 
00216   //Restore termios settings
00217   tcsetattr(STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &mOldTermios);
00218 
00219   //Note that we're not prepared
00220   mIsInitialised = false;
00221 
00222   //Return result
00223   return true;
00224 }
00225 //=============================================================================
00226 bool TeleopSourceKeyboard::handleEvent(char c, TeleopState* const teleopState, bool* updated) {
00227   //Handle known events
00228   switch(c) {
00229     case KEYCODE_UP:
00230       if (teleopState->axes[0].value >= TELEOP_AXIS_MAX) {
00231         return true;
00232       }
00233       teleopState->axes[0].value += mStepSize;
00234       if (teleopState->axes[0].value > TELEOP_AXIS_MAX) {
00235         teleopState->axes[0].value = TELEOP_AXIS_MAX;
00236       }
00237       *updated = true;
00238       return true;
00239     case KEYCODE_DOWN:
00240       if (teleopState->axes[0].value <= TELEOP_AXIS_MIN) {
00241         return true;
00242       }
00243       teleopState->axes[0].value -= mStepSize;
00244       if (teleopState->axes[0].value < TELEOP_AXIS_MIN) {
00245         teleopState->axes[0].value = TELEOP_AXIS_MIN;
00246       }
00247       *updated = true;
00248       return true;
00249     case KEYCODE_RIGHT:
00250       if (teleopState->axes[1].value <= TELEOP_AXIS_MIN) {
00251         return true;
00252       }
00253       teleopState->axes[1].value -= mStepSize;
00254       if (teleopState->axes[1].value < TELEOP_AXIS_MIN) {
00255         teleopState->axes[1].value = TELEOP_AXIS_MIN;
00256       }
00257       *updated = true;
00258       return true;
00259     case KEYCODE_LEFT:
00260       if (teleopState->axes[1].value >= TELEOP_AXIS_MAX) {
00261         return true;
00262       }
00263       teleopState->axes[1].value += mStepSize;
00264       if (teleopState->axes[1].value > TELEOP_AXIS_MAX) {
00265         teleopState->axes[1].value = TELEOP_AXIS_MAX;
00266       }
00267       *updated = true;
00268       return true;
00269     case KEYCODE_SPACE:
00270       if (0.0 != teleopState->axes[0].value || 0.0 != teleopState->axes[1].value) {
00271         teleopState->axes[0].value = 0.0;
00272         teleopState->axes[1].value = 0.0;
00273         *updated = true;
00274       }
00275       return true;
00276     default:
00277       //Unknown key, return no change
00278       return true;
00279   }
00280 }
